price: Wọ́n tún wí pé: “Tí ó bá jẹ́ pé a gbọ́ràn ni tàbí pé a ṣe làákàyè ni, àwa kò níí wà nínú èrò inú Iná tó ń jó.”
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡ كُنَّا نَسۡمَعُ أَوۡ نَعۡقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqālū law kunnā nasmaʿu aw naʿqilu mā kunnā fī aṣḥābi al-saʿīri
